description: The Catholic Church says vaccines developed using cell lines derived from aborted foetuses can be used.
title: Covid: Vatican says coronavirus vaccines 'morally acceptable'
title_page: Covid: Vatican says coronavirus vaccines 'morally acceptable' - BBC News
maintext: "All vaccinations recognised as clinically safe and effective can be used in good conscience with the certain knowledge that the use of such vaccines does not constitute formal co-operation with the abortion from which the cells used in production of the vaccines derive," the Vatican's Congregation for the Doctrine of the Faith announced in a statement on Monday.
